protocol_name: Immunofluorescence staining protocol for co-staining of fetuin-A and GFAP in older human autopsy tissue via Tyramide Signal Amplification
protocol_name_html: Immunofluorescence staining protocol for co-staining of fetuin-A and GFAP in older human autopsy tissue via Tyramide Signal Amplification
description: This staining was performed to detect fetuin-A in astrocytes. Fetuin-A and astrocytes were detected in paraffin sections (1 μm thickness) of formalin-fixed human brain tissue. Glial Fibrillary Acid Antigen (GFAP) was marked by a polyclonal rabbit-anti-human antibody (Spring Bioscience Cat# E18320, RRID:AB_1661177, dilution 1:50) and a polyclonal goat-anti-rabbit Alexa Fluor® 488 conjugated secondary antibody (Thermo Fisher Scientific Cat# A-11070, RRID:AB_2534114, dilution 1:300).Fetuin-A was detected by using a monoclonal IgG2a mouse-anti-human antibody (clone MAHS-1, dilution 1.0 µg/mL), raised against purified human fetuin-A in our laboratories. Antibody binding was detected by tyramide signal amplification using a secondary biotinylated polyclonal goat-anti-mouse antibody (Dako Cat# E0433, RRID:AB_2687905, dilution 1:300) and a Tyramide Signal Amplification Kit (Life Technologies, Carlsbad, USA, T-20933). To minimize lipofuscin autofluorescence, sections were counterstained with Sudan Black (Sigma-Aldrich, Munich, Germany, 199664, dilution 0.3% in 70% ethanol, 5 minutes). Nuclei were stained with DAPI (Sigma-Aldrich, Munich, Germany D9542, dilution 0.25 µg/ml, 5 minutes). Sections were mounted with Immumount (Thermo Scientific, Waltham, USA, 9990402) and stored at 8°C in the dark.
before_start:
Prepare the following components of the Tyramide Signal Amplification Kit according to the manufacturers protocol:

  1. Prepare tyramide stock solution by dissolving Component A in 150 μL of Component B (DMSO). (Store unused portions of this stock solution in small aliquots at ≤ – 20°C, protected from light).
  2. Prepare a 1% (10 mg/mL) solution of Component D (BSA) in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS).
  3. Prepare the horse radish peroxidase (HRP) conjugate stock solution by reconstituting Component C in 200 µl PBS. (This solution may be stored at 2–8°C for up to 3 months).
  4. Prepare amplification buffer/0.0015% H2O2 by adding 30% hydrogen peroxide (Component F) to amplification buffer (Component E) to obtain a final concentration of 0.0015% H2O2. For example, add 1 μL of 30% H2O2 to 200 μL of amplification buffer and then add 1 μL of this intermediate dilution (0.15% H2O2) to a further 100 μL of amplification buffer.
manuscript_citation: Heinen MC, Babler A, Weis J, Elsas J, Nolte K, Kipp M, Jahnen-Dechent W, Häusler M (2018) Fetuin-A protein distribution in mature inflamed and ischemic brain tissue. PLoS ONE 13(11): e0206597. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0206597
guidelines: use with Tyramide Signal Amplification Kit (life technologies, T-20933)

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"ee6nf","text":"Place slides in hybridization oven: 37\u00b0C overnight, then 1 hour at 65\u00b0C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9eq5","text":"Deparaffination in xylene 3x20 minutes (different containers) on a shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4grga","text":"Rehydration in graded ethanol: 3x2 minutes in 100% ethanol, followed by 2x2 minutes in 96% ethanol and at last 2 minutes in 70% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"43de8","text":"Wash in PBS for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7mmn","text":"Antigen retrieval in citrate buffer (10 mM, pH 6) in a heat steamer for 30 minutes. Afterwards let the slides cool down in PBS for 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5hc90","text":"Wash in PBS for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"169ic","text":"Encircle tissue section with wax pen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjd37","text":"To block non-specific binding, apply a solution of 10% goat serum in PBS, incubation for 1 hour in a moisture chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"94q89","text":"Tip off excess solution and apply the primary antibodies MAHS-1 (dilution 1 \u00b5g\/ml) and Anti-GFAP (dilution 1:50) in 1%\u00a0 BSA in PBS, 100 \u00b5l per section (negative controls: only 1% dilution), incubation overnight in a moisture chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"215j6","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ats30","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bohmh","text":"Apply the secondary antibodies: biotinylated goat-anti-mouse antibody (dilution 1:300) and polyclonal goat-anti-rabbit Alexa Fluor\u00ae 488 conjugated secondary antibody (dilution 1:300), both in 1% of BSA in PBS, 100 \u00b5l per section, incubation for 90 minutes at room temperature in a moisture chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"88nu0","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8flgq","text":"keep the tissue samples from now on light protected!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":52,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3pm73","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ioeq","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eplhg","text":"Apply the Tyramide Signal Amplification Kit as follows: Dilute the prior prepared HRP solution 1:100 in 1% BSA in PBS, apply 100 \u00b5l per section, incubation for 1 hour at room temperature in a moisture chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"r39v","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"euhhn","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50dll","text":"Prepare a tyramide working solution following the manufacturer\u2019s protocol: dilute the prior prepared tyramide stock solution 1:100 in the prepared 0.0015% hydrogen peroxid solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1kgmf","text":"Apply 100 \u00b5l per section, incubation for 10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4fane","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bbf1d","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"faonb","text":"To minimize lipofuscin autofluorescence, perform counterstaining with Sudan Black (dilution 0.3% in 70% ethanol) for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2mlql","text":"Rinse the container with demineralized water until the solution becomes clear and colorless","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"75grg","text":"Wash in demineralized water for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b7ne4","text":"Counterstain with DAPI (dilution 0.25 \u00b5g\/ml) for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1pr2r","text":"Wash in PBS for 3x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4sv02","text":"Coverslip using mounting medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"82uel","text":"store at 8\u00b0C in the dark","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"birh6","text":"Prepare the components of the Tyramide Signal Amplification Kit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
